We calculated the R-factor for the past and projected rainfall data using 84 regression equations (See Supplementary Table S1) developed for different regions of Brazil (see Fig. 5). These regression equations come from previous studies that compute EI 30 using high resolution rainfall data and the equations ( 3– 6). More details about the USLE-R factor regression equations used in this study are discussed in Oliveira et al.
